name: Save'en
description:
- Collect all coins to unlock a secret!! -

How to play: 

Arrow keys - movement

P - pause

It was discovered, long ago, that the number 7 had meanings beyond our comprehension. Because of those findings, the society build itself upon the belief that if all things didn’t have 7 parts, they were incomplete. While some thrived with this new model of life, others wanted to destroy it. Guided by the hate, these people decided to disrupt the balance of the world by stealing, kidnapping, completely dismantling the 7s. It’s your duty to recover the missing or stolen parts, in order to keep the world complete.

Big ups to Somepx for the Humble gold font, Deep-Fold's pixel planet generator and Juno's amazing music.

Known Issue: The browser version has some audio glitches. For better audio performance download your OS version!
